text: The 2019–20 National First Division (called the GladAfrica Championship for sponsorship reasons) is the season from August 2019 to May 2020 of South Africa's second tier of professional soccer, the National First Division. For this season, the National First Division received new sponsorship from GladAfrica, with prize money being substantially increased to R3 million for the winners, R1.5 million for the runners up and R1 million for the third- placed team. ==Teams== ===Stadium and Locations=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Team ! Location ! Stadium !
